channel.title: The Duncan Trussell Family Hour
channel.description: A weekly electronic salon style super show.
channel.itunes:author: Duncan Trussell
channel.itunes:summary: A weekly salon-style supershow, where comedian Duncan Trussell and guests explore the outer reaches of the multiverse.

item.title: NATASHA LEGGERO
item.description: Natasha Leggero returns to the DTFH for a Lavender Hour reunion!
item.itunes:subtitle: Natasha Leggero returns to the DTFH for a Lavender Hour reunion!

item.title: Aubrey Marcus
item.description: The great Warrior Poet, psychonaut, and shaman returns to the DTFH.
item.itunes:subtitle: The great Warrior Poet, psychonaut, and shaman returns to the DTFH.

item.title: EMIL AMOS
item.description: Emil (Grails, Holy Sons, Lilacs & Champagne, Shrimp Parade) returns to the DTFH for the ULTIMATE BARNBURNER.
item.itunes:subtitle: Emil (Grails, Holy Sons, Lilacs & Champagne, Shrimp Parade) returns to the DTFH for the ULTIMATE BARNBURNER.

item.title: JOE ROGAN & CHRIS RYAN
item.description: A glowing beam of pure drooling power will pour into your greasy ear holes when you listen to these three presidentially honored humans inject their bizzare energies into your brain.
item.itunes:subtitle: A glowing beam of pure drooling power will pour into your greasy ear holes when you listen to these three presidentially honored humans inject their bizzare energies into your brain.

item.title: Erin McGathy confronts the darklord
item.description: Erin McGathy (host of the amazing "This Feels Terrible" podcast) tells the story if her creepy mushroom trip in the demon ridden town of Asheville NC.   Duncan shines a light on the infiltration of The Walking Dead by the military industrial complex.
item.itunes:subtitle: Erin McGathy (host of the amazing "This Feels Terrible" podcast) tells the story if her creepy mushroom trip in the demon ridden town of Asheville NC.   Duncan shines a light on the infiltration of The Walking Dead by the military industrial complex.

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: NIGHT OF THE SNAKE (sample)
item.description:
Night of the Snake contains subliminal sub-audible demonic conditioning messages. It also contains a SPOOKY prank call, a reading of Edgar Allen Poe's premature burial, an appearance by Snake and Alpha-Duncan, and much Much MORE! All for a MERE TWO DOLLARS!

This is a bonus episode that will cost you TWO WHOLE DOLLARS, minimum! Scroll down to see additional purchasing options.
item.itunes:subtitle: Night of the Snake contains subliminal sub-audible demonic conditioning messages. It also contains a SPOOKY prank call, a reading of Edgar Allen Poe's premature burial, an appearance by Snake and Alpha-Duncan, and much Much MORE! All for a MERE TWO...

item.title: INITIATE POSTER CONTEST!
item.description:
We're holding a poster contest! Submit your poster designs to us by July 30th, midnight PST, for a chance to win an autographed prize-pack, an effusively thankful phone call from Duncan, and a possible mini-interview on the DTFH if you're into it!

Duncan will pick his top 10 designs, then we'll turn it over to the Family and let you vote for your favorites! The top 3 will be turned into the next official DTFH posters and sold in the shop.

It's just like the t-shirt contest, only this time anyone can enter!

Follow these basic specs for your design:

  • Size: 12.25" x 18.25"
  • Color: CMYK
  • Resolution: 300dpi minimum (or vector)

Thank you, and we love you!!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: We're holding a poster contest! Submit your poster designs to us by July 30th, midnight PST, for a chance to win an autographed prize-pack, an effusively thankful phone call from Duncan, and a possible mini-interview on the DTFH if you're into...

item.title: The Lavender Manifesto
item.description:
Duncan teaches Natasha about 6th grade Astronomy. They are then joined by the Office's own Oscar Nunez and his charming girlfriend Ursula.  They discuss Facebook addiction and the real truth about Hugo Chavez.
Bonus!  Learn how Republicans trick poor people into thinking they have more in common with Dick Cheney than with a gay couple.

item.title: Episode 8: Double Rainbow All The Way

item.title: Episode 4: "Cruel to be kind' with Tim and Marilyn Heidecker
item.description:
Natasha and Duncan get new equipment they don't understand and decide this is going to be a fortnightly rather than weekly podcast.  Tim and Marilyn Heidecker join and the four have one of the greatest conversations since the 60's. In this mind searing podcast Duncan and Tim nearly come to blows on topics ranging from Garfield to Sha-na-na.   

Plus great housing opportunities for homeless models!

item.description: In this episode Natasha and Duncan discuss pussy-nerds, laser toilets and get into a dumb fight about racism. item.description: In this episode Natasha and Duncan discuss the meaning of the lavender hour, the concept of "professional assholes" and the omnipresence of recording devices. Steve talks about how he became a twitter millionare, they give tips on how to find rent in Los Angeles for less than $50 a month, and they all act out a scene from Star Wars.
